<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Add the iCal event"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/2.0/calendar/outsideevent"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Adds the iCal event to the calendar specified in the request.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"calendarGuid":{"description":"Calendar GUID","type":"string"},"eventGuid":{"description":"Event GUID","type":"string"},"ics":{"description":"Event in the iCal format","type":"string"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Task awaiter","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object"}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
